content: the mosaic scheme is arranged in a rectangular wrap worked flat from the foundation chain first and last single_crochet are worked separate from mosaic scheme the second row of each color is worked in single_crochet and chain spaces identical to previous row worked chain spaces count as a stitches throughout work beginning chain 1 does not count as a stitch mosaic scheme repeats every 23 row throughout the body color changes worked in last single_crochet of each row where indicated by attaching new color using last two loops of single_crochet stitch charts are read as each row representing two crochet row in the same color charts are represented as worked from bottom to top use stitch markers to help maintain pattern repetition every 23 row per written pattern or every 13 row per body graph pattern if desired
